4183  const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_2_Surface);
4184  const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_Domain);
4185 
4186  /*--- The normal of the triangle formed by the line and domain
4187  * point should point in the positive z direction. ---*/
4188  constexpr int nDim = 2;
4189  su2double a[nDim] = {0.0}, b[nDim] = {0.0};
4190  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4191  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4192  bool test = a[0] * b[1] - a[1] * b[0] < 0.0;
4193 
4194  if (test) {
4195  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4196  line_flip++;
4197  }
4198  }
4199 
4200  /*--- 3D grid. ---*/
4201 
4202  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
4203  auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4204  auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4205  auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4206 
4207  /*--- The normal of the triangle should point into the domain,
4208  * resulting in a tetrahedron with positive volume. ---*/
4209  if (checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain)) {
4210  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4211  tria_flip++;
4212  }
4213  }
4214 
4215  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
4216  auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4217  auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4218  auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4219  auto Point_4_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(3);
4220 
4221  /*--- Divide quadrilateral/pyramid into triangles/tetrahedrons. ---*/
4222  int test_1 = checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain);
4223  int test_2 = checkTetra(Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_Domain);
4224  int test_3 = checkTetra(Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_Domain);
4225  int test_4 = checkTetra(Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_Domain);
4226 
4227  if (test_1 + test_2 + test_3 + test_4 >= 3) {
4228  /*--- If 3 or 4 tests fail there is > 75% chance flipping is the right choice. ---*/
4229  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4230  quad_flip++;
4231  } else if (test_1 + test_2 + test_3 + test_4 == 2) {
4232  /*--- If 50/50 we cannot be sure of what to do -> report to user.
4233  * If only one test fails it is probably (75%) due to skewness or warping. ---*/
4234  quad_error++;
4235  }
4236  }
4237  }
4238  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4239  }
4240  }
4241  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4242 
4243  auto reduce = [](unsigned long& val) {
4244  unsigned long tmp = val;
4245  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&tmp, &val, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4246  };
4247  reduce(line_flip);
4248  reduce(tria_flip);
4249  reduce(quad_flip);
4250  reduce(quad_error);
4251 
4252  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4253  string start("There has been a re-orientation of ");
4254  if (line_flip) cout << start << line_flip << " LINE surface elements." << endl;
4255  if (tria_flip) cout << start << tria_flip << " TRIANGLE surface elements." << endl;
4256  if (quad_flip) cout << start << quad_flip << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements." << endl;
4257 
4258  if (quad_error) {
4259  cout << ">>> WARNING: " << quad_error
4260  << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements are distorted.\n"
4261  " It was not possible to determine if their orientation is correct."
4262  << endl;
4263  }
4264 
4265  if (line_flip + tria_flip + quad_flip + quad_error == 0) {
4266  cout << "All surface elements are correctly oriented." << endl;
4267  }
4268  }
4269 }
4270 
4271 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPositive_ZArea(CConfig* config) {
4272  unsigned short iMarker, Boundary, Monitoring;
4273  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4274  su2double *Normal, PositiveXArea, PositiveYArea, PositiveZArea, WettedArea,
4275  CoordX = 0.0, CoordY = 0.0, CoordZ = 0.0, MinCoordX = 1E10, MinCoordY = 1E10, MinCoordZ = 1E10, MaxCoordX = -1E10,
4276  MaxCoordY = -1E10, MaxCoordZ = -1E10, TotalMinCoordX = 1E10, TotalMinCoordY = 1E10, TotalMinCoordZ = 1E10,
4277  TotalMaxCoordX = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordY = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordZ = -1E10;
4278  su2double TotalPositiveXArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveYArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveZArea = 0.0, TotalWettedArea = 0.0,
4279  AxiFactor;
4280 
4281  const bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
4282  const bool fea = config->GetStructuralProblem();
4283 
4284  PositiveXArea = 0.0;
4285  PositiveYArea = 0.0;
4286  PositiveZArea = 0.0;
4287  WettedArea = 0.0;
4288 
4289  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4290  Boundary = config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker);
4291  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
4292 
4293  if (((config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker) || Boundary == LOAD_BOUNDARY || Boundary == DISPLACEMENT_BOUNDARY) &&
4294  Monitoring == YES) ||
4295  fea) {
4296  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4297  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4298 
4299  if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
4300  Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
4301  CoordX = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 0);
4302  CoordY = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4303  if (nDim == 3) CoordZ = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 2);
4304 
4305  if (axisymmetric)
4306  AxiFactor = 2.0 * PI_NUMBER * nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4307  else
4308  AxiFactor = 1.0;
4309 
4310  WettedArea += AxiFactor * GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
4311 
4312  if (Normal[0] < 0) PositiveXArea -= Normal[0];
4313  if (Normal[1] < 0) PositiveYArea -= Normal[1];
4314  if ((nDim == 3) && (Normal[2] < 0)) PositiveZArea -= Normal[2];
4315 
4316  if (CoordX < MinCoordX) MinCoordX = CoordX;
4317  if (CoordX > MaxCoordX) MaxCoordX = CoordX;
4318 
4319  if (CoordY < MinCoordY) MinCoordY = CoordY;
4320  if (CoordY > MaxCoordY) MaxCoordY = CoordY;
4321 
4322  if (nDim == 3) {
4323  if (CoordZ < MinCoordZ) MinCoordZ = CoordZ;
4324  if (CoordZ > MaxCoordZ) MaxCoordZ = CoordZ;
4325  }
4326  }
4327  }
4328  }
4329  }
4330 
4331  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveXArea, &TotalPositiveXArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4332  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveYArea, &TotalPositiveYArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4333  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveZArea, &TotalPositiveZArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4334 
4335  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordX, &TotalMinCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4336  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordY, &TotalMinCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4337  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordZ, &TotalMinCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4338 
4339  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordX, &TotalMaxCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4340  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordY, &TotalMaxCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4341  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordZ, &TotalMaxCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4342 
4343  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&WettedArea, &TotalWettedArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4344 
4345  /*--- Set a reference area if no value is provided ---*/
4346 
4347  const string L = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) ? " m" : " ft";
4348  const string A = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) ? " m^2" : " ft^2";
4349  const bool D3 = (nDim == 3);
4350 
4351  if (config->GetRefArea() == 0.0) {
4352  if (D3)
4353  config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveZArea);
4354  else
4355  config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveYArea);
4356 
4357  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4358  if (D3)
4359  cout << "Reference area = " << TotalPositiveZArea << A << ".\n";
4360  else
4361  cout << "Reference length = " << TotalPositiveYArea << L << ".\n";
4362  }
4363  }
4364 
4365  /*--- Set a semi-span value if no value is provided ---*/
4366 
4367  if (config->GetSemiSpan() == 0.0) {
4368  if (D3)
4369  config->SetSemiSpan(fabs(TotalMaxCoordY));
4370  else
4371  config->SetSemiSpan(1.0);
4372 
4373  if (D3 && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
4374  cout << "Semi-span length = " << TotalMaxCoordY << L << ".\n";
4375  }
4376  }
4377 
4378  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4379  if (fea)
4380  cout << "Surface area = " << TotalWettedArea;
4381  else
4382  cout << "Wetted area = " << TotalWettedArea;
4383  if (D3 || axisymmetric)
4384  cout << A << ".\n";
4385  else
4386  cout << L << ".\n";
4387 
4388  cout << "Area projection in the x-plane = " << TotalPositiveXArea << (D3 ? A : L);
4389  cout << ", y-plane = " << TotalPositiveYArea << (D3 ? A : L);
4390  if (D3) cout << ", z-plane = " << TotalPositiveZArea << A;
4391  cout << ".\n";
4392 
4393  cout << "Max. coordinate in the x-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordX << L;
4394  cout << ", y-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordY << L;
4395  if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordZ << L;
4396  cout << ".\n";
4397 
4398  cout << "Min. coordinate in the x-direction = " << TotalMinCoordX << L;
4399  cout << ", y-direction = " << TotalMinCoordY << L;
4400  if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = " << TotalMinCoordZ << L;
4401  cout << "." << endl;
4402  }
4403 }
4404 
4405 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPoint_Connectivity() {
4406  vector<vector<unsigned long> > points(nPoint);
4407 
4408  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
4409  unsigned short Node_Neighbor, iNode, iNeighbor;
4410  unsigned long jElem, Point_Neighbor, iPoint, iElem;
4411 
4412  /*--- Loop over all the elements ---*/
4413  BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS {
4414  vector<vector<long> > elems(nPoint);
4415 
4416  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4417  /*--- Loop over all the nodes of an element ---*/
4418  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4419  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4420  elems[iPoint].push_back(iElem);
4421  }
4422  }
4423  nodes->SetElems(elems);
4424  }
4425  END_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
4426 
4427  /*--- Loop over all the points ---*/
4428 
4429  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint, 2 * omp_get_max_threads()))
4430  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4431  /*--- Loop over all elements shared by the point ---*/
4432 
4433  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(iPoint); iElem++) {
4434  jElem = nodes->GetElem(iPoint, iElem);
4435 
4436  /*--- If we find the point iPoint in the surrounding element ---*/
4437 
4438  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[jElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4439  if (elem[jElem]->GetNode(iNode) != iPoint) continue;
4440 
4441  /*--- Localize the local index of the neighbor of iPoint in the element ---*/
4442 
4443  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < elem[jElem]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor++) {
4444  Node_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor);
4445  Point_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNode(Node_Neighbor);
4446 
4447  /*--- Store the point into the point, if it is new ---*/
4448  auto End = points[iPoint].end();
4449  if (find(points[iPoint].begin(), End, Point_Neighbor) == End) points[iPoint].push_back(Point_Neighbor);
4450  }
4451  }
4452  }
4453 
4454  /*--- Set the number of neighbors variable, this is important for JST and multigrid in parallel. ---*/
4455  nodes->SetnNeighbor(iPoint, points[iPoint].size());
4456  }
4457  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4458 
4459  SU2_OMP_MASTER
4460  nodes->SetPoints(points);
4461  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4462  }
4463  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4464 }
4465 
4466 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetRCM_Ordering(CConfig* config) {
4467  /*--- The result is the RCM ordering, during the process it is also used as
4468  * the queue of new points considered by the algorithm. This is possible
4469  * because points move from the front of the queue to the back of the result,
4470  * which is equivalent to incrementing an integer marking the end of the
4471  * result and the start of the queue. ---*/
4472  vector<char> InQueue(nPoint, false);
4473  vector<unsigned long> AuxQueue, Result;
4474  Result.reserve(nPoint);
4475  unsigned long QueueStart = 0;
4476 
4477  /*--- Exclude halo nodes from the ordering process. ---*/
4478  for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4479  InQueue[iPoint] = true;
4480  }
4481 
4482  /*--- Repeat as many times as necessary to handle disconnected graphs. ---*/
4483  while (Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4484  /*--- Select the node with the lowest degree in the grid. ---*/
4485  auto AddPoint = nPoint;
4486  auto MinDegree = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
4487  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4488  auto Degree = nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint);
4489  if (!InQueue[iPoint] && Degree < MinDegree) {
4490  MinDegree = Degree;
4491  AddPoint = iPoint;
4492  }
4493  }
4494  if (AddPoint == nPoint) {
4495  SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4496  }
4497 
4498  /*--- Seed the queue with the minimum degree node. ---*/
4499  Result.push_back(AddPoint);
4500  InQueue[AddPoint] = true;
4501 
4502  /*--- Loop until reorganizing all nodes connected to AddPoint. This will
4503  * also terminate early once the ordering + queue include all points. ---*/
4504  while (QueueStart < Result.size() && Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4505  /*--- Move the start of the queue, equivalent to taking from the front of
4506  * the queue and inserting at the end of the result. ---*/
4507  AddPoint = Result[QueueStart];
4508  ++QueueStart;
4509 
4510  /*--- Add all adjacent nodes to the queue in increasing order of their
4511  degree, checking if the element is already in the queue. ---*/
4512  AuxQueue.clear();
4513  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < nodes->GetnPoint(AddPoint); iNode++) {
4514  const auto AdjPoint = nodes->GetPoint(AddPoint, iNode);
4515  if (!InQueue[AdjPoint]) {
4516  AuxQueue.push_back(AdjPoint);
4517  InQueue[AdjPoint] = true;
4518  }
4519  }
4520  if (AuxQueue.empty()) continue;
4521 
4522  /*--- Sort the auxiliar queue based on the number of neighbors (degree). ---*/
4523  stable_sort(AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end(), [&](unsigned long iPoint, unsigned long jPoint) {
4524  return nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint) < nodes->GetnPoint(jPoint);
4525  });
4526  Result.insert(Result.end(), AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end());
4527  }
4528  }
4529  reverse(Result.begin(), Result.end());
4530 
4531  /*--- Check that all the points have been added ---*/
4532  for (const auto status : InQueue) {
4533  if (!status) SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4534  }
4535 
4536  /*--- Add the MPI points ---*/
4537  for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4538  Result.push_back(iPoint);
4539  }
4540 
4541  /*--- Reset old data structures ---*/
4542 
4543  nodes->ResetElems();
4544  nodes->ResetPoints();
4545 
4546  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4547  nodes->ResetBoundary(iPoint);
4548  nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(iPoint, false);
4549  nodes->SetSolidBoundary(iPoint, false);
4550  nodes->SetViscousBoundary(iPoint, false);
4551  nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(iPoint, false);
4552  nodes->SetDomain(iPoint, true);
4553  }
4554 
4555  /*--- Set the new coordinates ---*/
4556 
4557  su2activematrix AuxCoord(nPoint, nDim);
4558  vector<unsigned long> AuxGlobalIndex(nPoint);
4559 
4560  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4561  AuxGlobalIndex[iPoint] = nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4562  for (auto iDim = 0u; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4563  AuxCoord(iPoint, iDim) = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, iDim);
4564  }
4565  }
4566 
4567  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4568  nodes->SetGlobalIndex(iPoint, AuxGlobalIndex[Result[iPoint]]);
4569  nodes->SetCoord(iPoint, AuxCoord[Result[iPoint]]);
4570  }
4571 
4572  /*--- Set the new conectivities ---*/
4573 
4574  auto& InvResult = AuxGlobalIndex; // alias to re-use storage
4575  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4576  InvResult[Result[iPoint]] = iPoint;
4577  }
4578 
4579  for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4580  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4581  auto iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4582  elem[iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4583  }
4584  }
4585 
4586  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4587  for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
4588  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE && config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0) {
4589  nodes->SetDomain(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(0), false);
4590  }
4591 
4592  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4593  auto iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4594  bound[iMarker][iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4595  nodes->SetBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], nMarker);
4596  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
4597  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
4598  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
4599  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4600  nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4601 
4602  if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetSolidBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4603 
4604  if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetViscousBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4605 
4606  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4607  nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4608  }
4609  }
4610  }
4611 }
4612 
4613 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetElement_Connectivity() {
4614  unsigned short first_elem_face, second_elem_face, iFace, iNode, jElem;
4615  unsigned long face_point, Test_Elem, iElem;
4616 
4617  /*--- Loop over all the elements, faces and nodes ---*/
4618 
4619  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++)
4620  for (iFace = 0; iFace < elem[iElem]->GetnFaces(); iFace++)
4621  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodesFace(iFace); iNode++) {
4622  face_point = elem[iElem]->GetNode(elem[iElem]->GetFaces(iFace, iNode));
4623 
4624  /*--- Loop over all elements sharing the face point ---*/
4625 
4626  for (jElem = 0; jElem < nodes->GetnElem(face_point); jElem++) {
4627  Test_Elem = nodes->GetElem(face_point, jElem);
4628 
4629  /*--- If it is a new element in this face ---*/
4630 
4631  if ((elem[iElem]->GetNeighbor_Elements(iFace) == -1) && (iElem < Test_Elem) &&
4632  FindFace(iElem, Test_Elem, first_elem_face, second_elem_face)) {
4633  /*--- Localice which faces are sharing both elements ---*/
4634 
4635  elem[iElem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(Test_Elem, first_elem_face);
4636 
4637  /*--- Store the element for both elements ---*/
4638 
4639  elem[Test_Elem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(iElem, second_elem_face);
4640  }
4641  }
4642  }
4643 }
4644 
4645 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundVolume() {
4646  unsigned short cont, iMarker, iElem, iNode_Domain, iNode_Surface;
4647  unsigned long Point_Domain, Point_Surface, Point, iElem_Surface, iElem_Domain;
4648  bool CheckVol;
4649 
4650  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4651  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
4652  /*--- Choose and arbitrary point from the surface --*/
4653  Point = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4654  CheckVol = false;
4655 
4656  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(Point); iElem++) {
4657  /*--- Look for elements surronding that point --*/
4658  cont = 0;
4659  iElem_Domain = nodes->GetElem(Point, iElem);
4660  for (iNode_Domain = 0; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
4661  Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
4662  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
4663  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
4664  if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) cont++;
4665  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4666  }
4667  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4668  }
4669 
4670  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) {
4671  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->SetDomainElement(iElem_Domain);
4672  CheckVol = true;
4673  break;
4674  }
4675  }
4676  if (!CheckVol) {
4677  char buf[100];
4678  SPRINTF(buf, "The surface element (%u, %lu) doesn't have an associated volume element", iMarker, iElem_Surface);
4679  SU2_MPI::Error(buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4680  }
4681  }
4682 }
4683 
4684 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetVertex(const CConfig* config) {
4685  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex, iElem;
4686  unsigned short iMarker, iNode;
4687 
4688  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node of the grid ---*/
4689 
4690  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
4691  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
4692 
4693  /*--- Create and compute the vector with the number of vertex per marker ---*/
4694 
4695  nVertex = new unsigned long[nMarker];
4696  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4697  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
4698 
4699  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
4700  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
4701  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4702  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4703 
4704  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
4705 
4706  if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
4707  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
4708  nVertex[iMarker]++;
4709  }
4710  }
4711  }
4712 
4713  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node, the previous result is deleted ---*/
4714 
4715  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
4716  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
4717 
4718  /*--- Create the bound vertex structure, note that the order
4719  is the same as in the input file, this is important for Send/Receive part ---*/
4720 
4721  vertex = new CVertex**[nMarker];
4722  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4723  vertex[iMarker] = new CVertex*[nVertex[iMarker]];
4724  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
4725 
4726  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
4727 
4728  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
4729  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4730  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4731 
4732  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
4733 
4734  if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
4735  iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
4736  vertex[iMarker][iVertex] = new CVertex(iPoint, nDim);
4737 
4738  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) {
4739  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetRotation_Type());
4740  }
4741  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
4742  nVertex[iMarker]++;
4743  }
4744  }
4745  }
4746 }
4747 
4748 void CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeNSpan(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
4749  bool allocate) {
4750  unsigned short iMarker, jMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan;
4751  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
4752  long jVertex;
4753  int nSpan, nSpan_loc;
4754  su2double *coord, *valueSpan, min, max, radius, delta;
4755  short PeriodicBoundary;
4756  unsigned short SpanWise_Kind = config->GetKind_SpanWise();
4757 
4758  unsigned short iSize;
4759  int nSpan_max;
4760  su2double MyMin, MyMax;
4761 
4762  nSpan = 0;
4763  nSpan_loc = 0;
4764  if (nDim == 2) {
4765  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = 1;
4766  // TODO (turbo) make it more genral
4767  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) config->SetnSpanWiseSections(1);
4768 
4769  /*---Initilize the vector of span-wise values that will be ordered ---*/
4770  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = new su2double[1];
4771  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < 1; iSpan++) {
4772  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = 0;
4773  }
4774  } else {
4775  if (SpanWise_Kind == AUTOMATIC) {
4776  /*--- loop to find inflow of outflow marker---*/
4777  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4778  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4779  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4780  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4781 
4782  /*--- loop to find the vertex that ar both of inflow or outflow marker and on the periodic
4783  * in order to caount the number of Span ---*/
4784  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4785  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4786 
4787  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4788  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4789  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4790 
4791  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4792  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4793 
4794  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4795  nSpan++;
4796  }
4797  }
4798  }
4799  }
4800  }
4801 
4802  /*--- storing the local number of span---*/
4803  nSpan_loc = nSpan;
4804  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4805  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan_max, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4806 
4807  /*--- initialize the vector that will contain the disordered values span-wise ---*/
4808  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = nSpan;
4809  valueSpan = new su2double[nSpan];
4810 
4811  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++) {
4812  valueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
4813  }
4814 
4815  /*--- store the local span-wise value for each processor ---*/
4816  nSpan_loc = 0;
4817  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4818  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4819  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4820  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4821 
4822  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4823  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4824 
4825  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4826  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4827  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4828 
4829  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4830  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4831 
4832  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4833  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4834  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
4835  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
4836  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
4837  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4838  break;
4839  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
4840  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4841  break;
4842  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
4843  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4844  break;
4845  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
4846  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4847  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4848  } else {
4849  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4850  }
4851  break;
4852  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
4853  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
4854  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4855  } else {
4856  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4857  }
4858  break;
4859  }
4860  nSpan_loc++;
4861  }
4862  }
4863  }
4864  }
4865  }
4866 
4867  /*--- Gather the span-wise values on all the processor ---*/
4868 
4869  vector<su2double> MyTotValueSpan(nSpan_max * size, -1001.0);
4870  vector<su2double> MyValueSpan(nSpan_max, -1001.0);
4871  vector<int> My_nSpan_loc(size);
4872 
4873  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan_loc; iSpan++) {
4874  MyValueSpan[iSpan] = valueSpan[iSpan];
4875  }
4876 
4877  SU2_MPI::Allgather(MyValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE, MyTotValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE,
4878  SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4879  SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nSpan_loc, 1, MPI_INT, My_nSpan_loc.data(), 1, MPI_INT, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4880 
4881  jSpan = 0;
4882  for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
4883  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < My_nSpan_loc[iSize]; iSpan++) {
4884  valueSpan[jSpan] = MyTotValueSpan[iSize * nSpan_max + iSpan];
4885  jSpan++;
4886  }
4887  }
4888  if (jSpan != nSpan) SU2_MPI::Error("Panic!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4889 
4890  /*--- Terrible stuff to do but so is this entire bloody function goodness me... ---*/
4891  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = valueSpan;
4892 
4893  sort(SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1], SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] + nSpan);
4894 
4895  /*--- Find the minimum value among the span-wise values ---*/
4896  min = SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][0];
4897  }
4898  /*--- Compute equispaced Span-wise sections using number of section specified by the User---*/
4899  else {
4900  /*--- Initialize number of span---*/
4901  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User();
4902  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = new su2double[config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User()];
4903  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User(); iSpan++) {
4904  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = 0;
4905  }
4906  /*--- Compute maximum and minimum value span-wise---*/
4907  min = 1E+07;
4908  max = -1E+07;
4909  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4910  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4911  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4912  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4913 
4914  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4915  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4916 
4917  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4918  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4919  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4920 
4921  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4922  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4923 
4924  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4925  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4926  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
4927  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
4928  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
4929  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
4930  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4931  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4932  break;
4933  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
4934  if (radius < min) min = radius;
4935  if (radius > max) max = radius;
4936  break;
4937  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
4938  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4939  if (radius < min) min = radius;
4940  if (radius > max) max = radius;
4941  } else {
4942  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4943  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4944  }
4945  break;
4946  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
4947  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
4948  if (radius < min) min = radius;
4949  if (radius > max) max = radius;
4950  } else {
4951  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4952  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4953  }
4954  break;
4955  }
4956  }
4957  }
4958  }
4959  }
4960  }
4961  /*--- compute global minimum and maximum value on span-wise ---*/
4962  MyMin = min;
4963  min = 0;
4964  MyMax = max;
4965  max = 0;
4966  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &min, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4967  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &max, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4968 
4969  /*--- compute height value for each spanwise section---*/
4970  delta = (max - min) / (nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] - 1);
4971  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
4972  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = min + delta * iSpan;
4973  }
4974  }
4975 
4976  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4977  if (nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW - 1] != nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]) {
4978  char buf[100];
4979  SPRINTF(buf, "nSpan inflow %u, nSpan outflow %u", nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW - 1],
4980  nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]);
4981  SU2_MPI::Error(
4982  string(" At the moment only turbomachinery with the same amount of span-wise section can be simulated\n") +
4983  buf,
4984  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4985  } else {
4986  config->SetnSpanWiseSections(nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]);
4987  }
4988  }
4989  }
4990 }
4991 
4992 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetTurboVertex(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
4993  bool allocate) {
4994  unsigned long iPoint, **ordered, **disordered, **oldVertex3D, iInternalVertex;
4995  unsigned long nVert, nVertMax;
4996  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan, iDim;
4997  su2double min, minInt, max, *coord, dist, Normal2, *TurboNormal, *NormalArea, target = 0.0, **area, ***unitnormal,
4998  Area = 0.0;
4999  bool** checkAssign;
5000  min = 10.0E+06;
5001  minInt = 10.0E+06;
5002  max = -10.0E+06;
5003 
5004  su2double radius;
5005  long iVertex, iSpanVertex, jSpanVertex, kSpanVertex = 0;
5006  int *nTotVertex_gb, *nVertexSpanHalo;
5007  su2double **x_loc, **y_loc, **z_loc, **angCoord_loc, **deltaAngCoord_loc, **angPitch, **deltaAngPitch,
5008  *minIntAngPitch, *minAngPitch, *maxAngPitch;
5009  int** rank_loc;
5010 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5011  unsigned short iSize, kSize = 0, jSize;
5012  su2double MyMin, MyIntMin, MyMax;
5013  su2double *x_gb = nullptr, *y_gb = nullptr, *z_gb = nullptr, *angCoord_gb = nullptr, *deltaAngCoord_gb = nullptr;
5014  bool* checkAssign_gb = nullptr;
5015  unsigned long My_nVert;
5016 
5017 #endif
5018  string multizone_filename;
5019 
5020  x_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5021  y_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5022  z_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5023  angCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5024  deltaAngCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5025  angPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5026  deltaAngPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5027  rank_loc = new int*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5028  minAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5029  minIntAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5030  maxAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5031 
5032  nTotVertex_gb = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5033  nVertexSpanHalo = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5034  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5035  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = -1;
5036  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5037  minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5038  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5039  maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5040  }
5041 
5042  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
5043  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
5044  NormalArea = new su2double[3];
5045  ordered = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5046  disordered = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5047  oldVertex3D = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5048  area = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5049  unitnormal = new su2double**[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5050  checkAssign = new bool*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5051 
5052  /*--- Initialize the new Vertex structure. The if statement ensures that these vectors are initialized
5053  * only once even if the routine is called more than once.---*/
5054 
5055  if (allocate) {
5056  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5057  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5058  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5059  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5060  nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker] = nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
5061  nVertexSpan[iMarker] = new long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5062  turbovertex[iMarker] = new CTurboVertex**[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5063  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] = new unsigned long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5064  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5065  MinAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5066  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5067  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5068  nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5069  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = nullptr;
5070  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5071  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5072  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5073  }
5074  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5075  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5076  }
5077  }
5078  }
5079  }
5080  }
5081  }
5082 
5083  // this works only for turbomachinery rotating around the Z-Axes.
5084  // the reordering algorithm pitch-wise assumes that X-coordinate of each boundary vertex is positive so that
5085  // reordering can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5086  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5087  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5088  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5089  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5090  /*--- compute the amount of vertexes for each span-wise section to initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and
5091  * auxiliary pointers ---*/
5092  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5093  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5094  if (nDim == 3) {
5095  dist = 10E+06;
5096  jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5097  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5098 
5099  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5100  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5101  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5102  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5103  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5104  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5105  jSpan = iSpan;
5106  }
5107  }
5108  break;
5109  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5110  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5111  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5112  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5113  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5114  jSpan = iSpan;
5115  }
5116  }
5117  break;
5118  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5119  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5120  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5121  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5122  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5123  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5124  jSpan = iSpan;
5125  }
5126  }
5127  } else {
5128  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5129  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5130  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5131  jSpan = iSpan;
5132  }
5133  }
5134  }
5135  break;
5136 
5137  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5138  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5139  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5140  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5141  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5142  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5143  jSpan = iSpan;
5144  }
5145  }
5146  } else {
5147  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5148  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5149  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5150  jSpan = iSpan;
5151  }
5152  }
5153  }
5154  break;
5155  }
5156  }
5157 
5158  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5159  else {
5160  jSpan = 0;
5161  }
5162 
5163  if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5164  nVertexSpan[iMarker][jSpan]++;
5165  }
5166  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5167  }
5168 
5169  /*--- initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
5170  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5171  if (allocate) {
5172  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = new CTurboVertex*[nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]];
5173  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5174  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex] = nullptr;
5175  }
5176  }
5177  ordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5178  disordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5179  oldVertex3D[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5180  checkAssign[iSpan] = new bool[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5181  area[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5182  unitnormal[iSpan] = new su2double*[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5183  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5184  unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex] = new su2double[nDim];
5185  }
5186  angPitch[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5187  deltaAngPitch[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5188  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5189  }
5190 
5191  /*--- store the vertexes in a ordered manner in span-wise directions but not yet ordered pitch-wise ---*/
5192  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5193  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5194  if (nDim == 3) {
5195  dist = 10E+06;
5196  jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5197 
5198  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5199  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5200  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5201  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5202  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5203  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5204  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5205  jSpan = iSpan;
5206  }
5207  }
5208  break;
5209  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5210  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5211  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5212  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5213  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5214  jSpan = iSpan;
5215  }
5216  }
5217  break;
5218  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5219  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5220  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5221  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5222  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5223  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5224  jSpan = iSpan;
5225  }
5226  }
5227  } else {
5228  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5229  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5230  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5231  jSpan = iSpan;
5232  }
5233  }
5234  }
5235  break;
5236 
5237  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5238  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5239  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5240  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5241  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5242  dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5243  jSpan = iSpan;
5244  }
5245  }
5246  } else {
5247  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5248  if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5249  dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5250  jSpan = iSpan;
5251  }
5252  }
5253  }
5254  break;
5255  }
5256  }
5257  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5258  else {
5259  jSpan = 0;
5260  }
5261  /*--- compute the face area associated with the vertex ---*/
5262  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(NormalArea);
5263  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] = -NormalArea[iDim];
5264  Area = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, NormalArea);
5265 
5266  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] /= Area;
5267  /*--- store all the all the info into the auxiliary containers ---*/
5268  disordered[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iPoint;
5269  oldVertex3D[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iVertex;
5270  area[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = Area;
5271  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5272  unitnormal[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]][iDim] = NormalArea[iDim];
5273  }
5274  checkAssign[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = false;
5275  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5276  }
5277 
5278  /*--- using the auxiliary container reordered the vertexes pitch-wise direction at each span ---*/
5279  // the reordering algorithm can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5280  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5281  /*--- find the local minimum and maximum pitch-wise for each processor---*/
5282  min = 10E+06;
5283  minInt = 10E+06;
5284  max = -10E+06;
5285  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5286  iPoint = disordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5287  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5288  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among all nodes---*/
5289  if (coord[1] < min) {
5290  min = coord[1];
5291  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5292  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5293  } else {
5294  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5295  }
5296  minAngPitch[iSpan] = MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5297  kSpanVertex = iSpanVertex;
5298  }
5299 
5300  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5301  if (coord[1] < minInt) {
5302  if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5303  minInt = coord[1];
5304  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5305  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = coord[1];
5306  } else {
5307  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5308  }
5309  }
5310  }
5311 
5312  /*--- find nodes at maximum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5313  if (coord[1] > max) {
5314  if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5315  max = coord[1];
5316  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5317  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5318  } else {
5319  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5320  }
5321  maxAngPitch[iSpan] = MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5322  }
5323  }
5324  }
5325 
5326  iInternalVertex = 0;
5327 
5328  /*--- reordering the vertex pitch-wise, store the ordered vertexes span-wise and pitch-wise---*/
5329  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5330  dist = 10E+06;
5331  ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = disordered[iSpan][kSpanVertex];
5332  checkAssign[iSpan][kSpanVertex] = true;
5333  coord = nodes->GetCoord(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5334  target = coord[1];
5335  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5336  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
5337  } else {
5338  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5339  }
5340  if (iSpanVertex == 0) {
5341  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
5342  } else {
5343  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] - angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex - 1];
5344  }
5345  /*---create turbovertex structure only for the internal nodes---*/
5346  if (nodes->GetDomain(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex])) {
5347  if (allocate) {
5348  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex] = new CTurboVertex(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex], nDim);
5349  }
5350  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetArea(area[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5351  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetNormal(unitnormal[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5352  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetOldVertex(oldVertex3D[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5353  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetAngularCoord(angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5354  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetDeltaAngularCoord(deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5355  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5356  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5357  Normal2 = 0.0;
5358  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5359  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5360  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5361  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5362  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5363  } else {
5364  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5365  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5366  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5367  }
5368  break;
5369  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5370  Normal2 = 0.0;
5371  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5372  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5373  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5374  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5375  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5376  } else {
5377  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5378  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5379  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5380  }
5381  break;
5382  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5383  Normal2 = 0.0;
5384  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5385  if (nDim == 3) {
5386  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5387  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5388  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5389  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5390  } else {
5391  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5392  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5393  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5394  }
5395  } else {
5396  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5397  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
5398  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5399  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5400  } else {
5401  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
5402  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5403  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5404  }
5405  }
5406 
5407  break;
5408  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5409  Normal2 = 0.0;
5410  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5411  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5412  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5413  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5414  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5415  } else {
5416  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5417  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5418  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5419  }
5420  break;
5421 
5422  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5423  Normal2 = 0.0;
5424  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5425  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5426  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5427  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5428  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5429  } else {
5430  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5431  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5432  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5433  }
5434  break;
5435  }
5436  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5437  iInternalVertex++;
5438  }
5439 
5440  for (jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++) {
5441  coord = nodes->GetCoord(disordered[iSpan][jSpanVertex]);
5442  if (dist >= (coord[1] - target) && !checkAssign[iSpan][jSpanVertex] && (coord[1] - target) >= 0.0) {
5443  dist = coord[1] - target;
5444  kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
5445  }
5446  }
5447  }
5448  }
5449 
5450  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5451  delete[] ordered[iSpan];
5452  delete[] disordered[iSpan];
5453  delete[] oldVertex3D[iSpan];
5454  delete[] checkAssign[iSpan];
5455  delete[] area[iSpan];
5456  delete[] angPitch[iSpan];
5457  delete[] deltaAngPitch[iSpan];
5458 
5459  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5460  delete[] unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex];
5461  }
5462  delete[] unitnormal[iSpan];
5463  }
5464  }
5465  }
5466  }
5467  }
5468 
5469  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5470  nVertMax = 0;
5471 
5472  /*--- compute global max and min pitch per span ---*/
5473  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5474  nVert = 0;
5475 
5476 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5477  MyMin = minAngPitch[iSpan];
5478  minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5479  MyIntMin = minIntAngPitch[iSpan];
5480  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5481  MyMax = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
5482  maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+6;
5483 
5484  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &minAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5485  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyIntMin, &minIntAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5486  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &maxAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5487 #endif
5488 
5489  /*--- compute the relative angular pitch with respect to the minimum value ---*/
5490 
5491  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5492  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5493  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5494  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5495  nVert = nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
5496  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minAngPitch[iSpan];
5497  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
5498  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minIntAngPitch[iSpan] - minAngPitch[iSpan];
5499  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5500  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetRelAngularCoord(MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan]);
5501  }
5502  }
5503  }
5504  }
5505  }
5506 
5507 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5508  My_nVert = nVert;
5509  nVert = 0;
5510  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_nVert, &nVert, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5511 #endif
5512 
5513  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5514  if (nVert > nVertMax) {
5515  SetnVertexSpanMax(marker_flag, nVert);
5516  }
5517  /*--- for all the processor should be known the amount of total turbovertex per span ---*/
5518  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = (int)nVert;
5519 
5520  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5521  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5522  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5523  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5524  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = nVert;
5525  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] += nVert;
5526  }
5527  }
5528  }
5529  }
5530  }
5531 
5532  /*--- Printing Tec file to check the global ordering of the turbovertex pitch-wise ---*/
5533  /*--- Send all the info to the MASTERNODE ---*/
5534 
5535  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5536  x_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5537  y_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5538  z_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5539  angCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5540  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5541  rank_loc[iSpan] = new int[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5542  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5543  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5544  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5545  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5546  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5547  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5548  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1;
5549  }
5550  }
5551 
5552  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5553  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5554  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5555  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5556  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5557  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5558  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
5559  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5560  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[0];
5561  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
5562  if (nDim == 3) {
5563  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[2];
5564  } else {
5565  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
5566  }
5567  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetRelAngularCoord();
5568  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetDeltaAngularCoord();
5569  }
5570  }
5571  }
5572  }
5573  }
5574  }
5575 
5576 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5577 
5578  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5579  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5580  x_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5581  y_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5582  z_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5583  angCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5584  deltaAngCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5585  checkAssign_gb = new bool[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5586 
5587  for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
5588  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5589  checkAssign_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + iSpanVertex] = false;
5590  }
5591  }
5592  }
5593  SU2_MPI::Gather(y_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, y_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5594  SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5595  SU2_MPI::Gather(x_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, x_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5596  SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5597  SU2_MPI::Gather(z_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, z_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5598  SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5599  SU2_MPI::Gather(angCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, angCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan],
5600  MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5601  SU2_MPI::Gather(deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, deltaAngCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan],
5602  MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5603 
5604  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5605  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5606  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5607  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5608  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5609  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5610  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5611  }
5612 
5613  min = 10.0E+06;
5614  for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
5615  if (angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] < min && angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] >= 0.0) {
5616  kSize = iSize;
5617  min = angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5618  }
5619  }
5620 
5621  kSpanVertex = 0;
5622  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5623  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = x_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5624  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = y_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5625  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = z_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5626  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angCoord_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5627  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = deltaAngCoord_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5628  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = kSize;
5629  target = angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5630  checkAssign_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex] = true;
5631  min = 10.0E+06;
5632  for (jSize = 0; jSize < size; jSize++) {
5633  for (jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++) {
5634  if ((angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] < min) &&
5635  (angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] >= target) &&
5636  !checkAssign_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex]) {
5637  kSize = jSize;
5638  kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
5639  min = angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex];
5640  }
5641  }
5642  }
5643  }
5644 
5645  delete[] x_gb;
5646  delete[] y_gb;
5647  delete[] z_gb;
5648  delete[] angCoord_gb;
5649  delete[] deltaAngCoord_gb;
5650  delete[] checkAssign_gb;
5651  }
5652  }
5653 
5654 #endif
5655 
5656  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5657  if (marker_flag == INFLOW && val_iZone == 0) {
5658  std::string sPath = "TURBOMACHINERY";
5659  int nError = 0;
5660 #if defined(_WIN32)
5661 #ifdef __MINGW32__
5662  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // MINGW on Windows
5663 #else
5664  nError = _mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // can be used on Windows
5665 #endif
5666 #else
5667  mode_t nMode = 0733; // UNIX style permissions
5668  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str(), nMode); // can be used on non-Windows
5669 #endif
5670  if (nError != 0) {
5671  cout << "TURBOMACHINERY folder creation failed." << endl;
5672  }
5673  }
5674  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5675  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_inflow.dat";
5676  } else {
5677  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_outflow.dat";
5678  }
5679  char buffer[50];
5680 
5681  if (GetnZone() > 1) {
5682  unsigned short lastindex = multizone_filename.find_last_of('.');
5683  multizone_filename = multizone_filename.substr(0, lastindex);
5684  SPRINTF(buffer, "_%d.dat", SU2_TYPE::Int(val_iZone));
5685  multizone_filename.append(string(buffer));
5686  }
5687 
5688  // File to print the vector x_loc, y_loc, z_loc, globIdx_loc to check vertex ordering
5689  ofstream myfile;
5690  myfile.open(multizone_filename.data(), ios::out | ios::trunc);
5691  myfile.setf(ios::uppercase | ios::scientific);
5692  myfile.precision(8);
5693 
5694  myfile << "TITLE = \"Global index visualization file\"" << endl;
5695  myfile << "VARIABLES =" << endl;
5696  myfile.width(10);
5697  myfile << "\"iSpan\"";
5698  myfile.width(20);
5699  myfile << "\"x_coord\"";
5700  myfile.width(20);
5701  myfile << "\"y_coord\"";
5702  myfile.width(20);
5703  myfile << "\"z_coord\"";
5704  myfile.width(20);
5705  myfile << "\"radius\"";
5706  myfile.width(20);
5707  myfile << "\"Relative Angular Coord \"";
5708  myfile.width(20);
5709  myfile << "\"Delta Angular Coord \"";
5710  myfile.width(20);
5711  myfile << "\"processor\"" << endl;
5712  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5713  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5714  radius = sqrt(x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] +
5715  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5716  myfile.width(10);
5717  myfile << iSpan;
5718  myfile.width(20);
5719  myfile << x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5720  myfile.width(20);
5721  myfile << y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5722  myfile.width(20);
5723  myfile << z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5724  myfile.width(20);
5725  myfile << radius;
5726  if (nDim == 2) {
5727  myfile.width(20);
5728  myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5729  myfile.width(20);
5730  myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5731  } else {
5732  myfile.width(20);
5733  myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * 180.0 / PI_NUMBER;
5734  myfile.width(20);
5735  myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * 180.0 / PI_NUMBER;
5736  }
5737  myfile.width(20);
5738  myfile << rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] << endl;
5739  }
5740  myfile << endl;
5741  }
5742  }
5743 
5744  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5745  delete[] x_loc[iSpan];
5746  delete[] y_loc[iSpan];
5747  delete[] z_loc[iSpan];
5748  delete[] angCoord_loc[iSpan];
5749  delete[] deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan];
5750  delete[] rank_loc[iSpan];
5751  }
5752 
5753  delete[] area;
5754  delete[] ordered;
5755  delete[] disordered;
5756  delete[] oldVertex3D;
5757  delete[] checkAssign;
5758  delete[] TurboNormal;
5759  delete[] unitnormal;
5760  delete[] NormalArea;
5761  delete[] x_loc;
5762  delete[] y_loc;
5763  delete[] z_loc;
5764  delete[] angCoord_loc;
5765  delete[] nTotVertex_gb;
5766  delete[] nVertexSpanHalo;
5767  delete[] angPitch;
5768  delete[] deltaAngPitch;
5769  delete[] deltaAngCoord_loc;
5770  delete[] rank_loc;
5771  delete[] minAngPitch;
5772  delete[] maxAngPitch;
5773  delete[] minIntAngPitch;
5774 }
5775 
5776 void CPhysicalGeometry::UpdateTurboVertex(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag) {
5777  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
5778  long iSpanVertex, iPoint;
5779  su2double *coord, *TurboNormal, Normal2;
5780 
5781  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
5782  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
5783 
5784  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5785  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5786  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5787  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5788  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5789  for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5790  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
5791  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5792  /*--- compute appropriate turbo normal ---*/
5793  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5794  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5795  Normal2 = 0.0;
5796  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5797  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5798  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5799  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5800  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5801  } else {
5802  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5803  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5804  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5805  }
5806  break;
5807  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5808  Normal2 = 0.0;
5809  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5810  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5811  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5812  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5813  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5814  } else {
5815  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5816  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5817  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5818  }
5819  break;
5820  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5821  Normal2 = 0.0;
5822  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5823  if (nDim == 3) {
5824  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5825  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5826  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5827  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5828  } else {
5829  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5830  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5831  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5832  }
5833  } else {
5834  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5835  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
5836  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5837  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5838  } else {
5839  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
5840  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5841  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5842  }
5843  }
5844 
5845  break;
5846  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5847  Normal2 = 0.0;
5848  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5849  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5850  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5851  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5852  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5853  } else {
5854  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5855  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5856  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5857  }
5858  break;
5859 
5860  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5861  Normal2 = 0.0;
5862  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5863  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5864  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5865  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5866  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5867  } else {
5868  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5869  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5870  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5871  }
5872  break;
5873  }
5874 
5875  /*--- store the new turbo normal ---*/
5876  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5877  }
5878  }
5879  }
5880  }
5881  }
5882  }
5883 
5884  delete[] TurboNormal;
5885 }
5886 
5887 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetAvgTurboValue(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
5888  bool allocate) {
5889  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
5890  unsigned long iPoint;
5891  su2double *TurboNormal, *coord, *Normal, turboNormal2, Normal2, *gridVel, TotalArea, TotalRadius, radius;
5892  su2double *TotalTurboNormal, *TotalNormal, *TotalGridVel, Area;
5893  long iVertex;
5894  /*-- Variables declaration and allocation ---*/
5895  TotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5896  TotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5897  TurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5898  TotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
5899  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5900 
5901  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
5902 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5903  su2double MyTotalArea, MyTotalRadius, *MyTotalTurboNormal = nullptr, *MyTotalNormal = nullptr,
5904  *MyTotalGridVel = nullptr;
5905 #endif
5906 
5907  /*--- Intialization of the vector for the interested boundary ---*/
5908  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
5909  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5910  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5911  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5912  if (allocate) {
5913  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5914  AverageNormal[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5915  AverageGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5916  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5917  SpanArea[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5918  TurboRadius[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5919  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5920  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5921  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5922  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5923  }
5924  }
5925  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5926  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5927  SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5928  TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5929  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5930  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5931  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5932  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5933  }
5934  }
5935  }
5936  }
5937  }
5938  }
5939 
5940  /*--- start computing the average quantities span wise --- */
5941  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5942  /*--- Forces initialization for contenitors to zero ---*/
5943  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5944  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5945  TotalNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5946  TotalGridVel[iDim] = 0.0;
5947  }
5948  TotalArea = 0.0;
5949  TotalRadius = 0.0;
5950  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
5951  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5952  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5953  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5954  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5955  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
5956  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5957  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5958  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5959 
5960  if (nDim == 3) {
5961  radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5962  } else {
5963  radius = 0.0;
5964  }
5965  Area = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetArea();
5966  TotalArea += Area;
5967  TotalRadius += radius;
5968  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5969  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] += TurboNormal[iDim];
5970  TotalNormal[iDim] += Normal[iDim];
5971  }
5972  if (grid_movement) {
5973  gridVel = nodes->GetGridVel(iPoint);
5974  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) TotalGridVel[iDim] += gridVel[iDim];
5975  }
5976  }
5977  }
5978  }
5979  }
5980  }
5981 
5982 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5983 
5984  MyTotalArea = TotalArea;
5985  TotalArea = 0;
5986  MyTotalRadius = TotalRadius;
5987  TotalRadius = 0;
5988  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalArea, &TotalArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5989  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalRadius, &TotalRadius, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5990 
5991  MyTotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5992  MyTotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5993  MyTotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
5994 
5995  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5996  MyTotalTurboNormal[iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
5997  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5998  MyTotalNormal[iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim];
5999  TotalNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
6000  MyTotalGridVel[iDim] = TotalGridVel[iDim];
6001  TotalGridVel[iDim] = 0.0;
6002  }
6003 
6004  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalTurboNormal, TotalTurboNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6005  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalNormal, TotalNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6006  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalGridVel, TotalGridVel, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6007 
6008  delete[] MyTotalTurboNormal;
6009  delete[] MyTotalNormal;
6010  delete[] MyTotalGridVel;
6011 
6012 #endif
6013 
6014  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
6015  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
6016  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
6017  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
6018  SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalArea;
6019  TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalRadius / nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6020 
6021  turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6022  Normal2 = 0.0;
6023  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6024  turboNormal2 += TotalTurboNormal[iDim] * TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
6025  Normal2 += TotalNormal[iDim] * TotalNormal[iDim];
6026  }
6027  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6028  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim] / sqrt(turboNormal2);
6029  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim] / sqrt(Normal2);
6030  }
6031  if (grid_movement) {
6032  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6033  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalGridVel[iDim] / nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6034  }
6035  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
6036  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
6037  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
6038  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
6039  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6040  -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6041  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6042  } else {
6043  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6044  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6045  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6046  }
6047  break;
6048  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
6049  if (marker_flag == INFLOW && nDim == 2) {
6050  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6051  -AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] +
6052  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6053  } else {
6054  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6055  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6056  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6057  }
6058  break;
6059  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
6060  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
6061  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6062  (AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6063  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6064  } else {
6065  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6066  -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6067  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6068  }
6069  break;
6070  case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
6071  if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
6072  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6073  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6074  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6075  } else {
6076  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6077  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6078  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6079  }
6080  break;
6081 
6082  default:
6083  SU2_MPI::Error("Tang grid velocity NOT IMPLEMENTED YET for this configuration", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
6084  break;
6085  }
6086  }
6087 
6088  /*--- Compute the 1D average values ---*/
6089  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] +=
6090  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] / nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
6091  SpanArea[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] += SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan];
6092  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6093  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] +=
6094  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6095  AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] += AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6096  AverageGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] +=
6097  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] / nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
6098  }
6099  }
6100  }
6101  }
6102  }
6103  }
6104 
6105  /*--- Normalize 1D normals---*/
6106  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
6107  for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
6108  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
6109  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
6110  turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6111  Normal2 = 0.0;
6112 
6113  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6114  turboNormal2 += AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] *
6115  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim];
6116  Normal2 += AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] *
6117  AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim];
6118  }
6119  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6120  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] /= sqrt(turboNormal2);
6121  AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] /= sqrt(Normal2);
6122  }
6123  }
6124  }
6125  }
6126  }
6127 
6128  delete[] TotalTurboNormal;
6129  delete[] TotalNormal;
6130  delete[] TotalGridVel;
6131  delete[] TurboNormal;
6132  delete[] Normal;
6133 }
6134 
6135 void CPhysicalGeometry::GatherInOutAverageValues(CConfig* config, bool allocate) {
6136  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP;
6137  unsigned short iSpan, iDim;
6138  int markerTP;
6139  su2double nBlades;
6140  unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
6141 
6142  su2double tangGridVelIn, tangGridVelOut;
6143  su2double areaIn, areaOut, pitchIn, Pitch;
6144  su2double radiusIn, radiusOut, *turboNormal;
6145 
6146  turboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6147  Pitch = 0.0;
6148 
6149  if (allocate) {
6150  for (iMarkerTP = 0; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance(); iMarkerTP++) {
6151  SpanAreaIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
