10029  Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10030  Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10031 
10032  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10033  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10034 
10035  Length[iPlane] = Compute_Length(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10036  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10037 
10038  Width[iPlane] = Compute_Width(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10039  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10040 
10041  WaterLineWidth[iPlane] =
10042  Compute_WaterLineWidth(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10043  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10044 
10045  Height[iPlane] = Compute_Height(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10046  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10047  }
10048  }
10049 
10050  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that have been computed using a filtered value (they depend on more than one
10051  * point) ---*/
10052 
10053  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10054  Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
10055 
10056  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10057  if ((iPlane == 0) || (iPlane == nPlane - 1))
10058  Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
10059  else
10060  Curvature[iPlane] =
10061  Compute_Curvature(LeadingEdge[iPlane - 1], TrailingEdge[iPlane - 1], LeadingEdge[iPlane],
10062  TrailingEdge[iPlane], LeadingEdge[iPlane + 1], TrailingEdge[iPlane + 1]);
10063  }
10064  }
10065 
10066  /*--- Set the curvature and dihedral angles at the extremes ---*/
10067 
10068  if (nPlane > 1) {
10069  if ((!Xcoord_Airfoil[0].empty()) && (!Xcoord_Airfoil[1].empty())) {
10070  Curvature[0] = Curvature[1];
10071  }
10072  if ((!Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane - 1].empty()) && (!Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane - 2].empty())) {
10073  Curvature[nPlane - 1] = Curvature[nPlane - 2];
10074  }
10075  }
10076 
10077  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
10078 
10079  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10080  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10081  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10082  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] << ", " << Area[iPlane] << ", " << Length[iPlane] << ", "
10083  << Width[iPlane] << ", " << WaterLineWidth[iPlane] << ", " << Height[iPlane] << ", "
10084  << Curvature[iPlane] << ", " << -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] << ", " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0]
10085  << ", " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << ", " << -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] << ", "
10086  << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] << ", " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10087  } else {
10088  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] << " " << Area[iPlane] << " " << Length[iPlane] << " "
10089  << Width[iPlane] << " " << WaterLineWidth[iPlane] << " " << Height[iPlane] << " "
10090  << Curvature[iPlane] << " " << -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] << " " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] << " "
10091  << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << " " << -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]
10092  << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10093  }
10094  }
10095  }
10096 
10097  Fuselage_File.close();
10098 
10099  Section_File.open("fuselage_slices.dat", ios::out);
10100 
10101  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10102  if (iPlane == 0) {
10103  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Aircraft Slices\"" << endl;
10104  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10105  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\"" << endl;
10106  else
10107  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\"" << endl;
10108  }
10109 
10110  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10111  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"X = " << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] << " \", I= " << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size()
10112  << ", F=POINT" << endl;
10113 
10114  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
10115  /*--- Write the file ---*/
10116 
10117  Section_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " "
10118  << Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << endl;
10119  }
10120  }
10121  }
10122 
10123  Section_File.close();
10124 
10125  /*--- Compute the fuselage volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
10126 
10127  Fuselage_Volume = 0.0;
10128  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane - 2; iPlane += 2) {
10129  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10130  Fuselage_Volume += (1.0 / 3.0) * dPlane * (Area[iPlane] + 4.0 * Area[iPlane + 1] + Area[iPlane + 2]);
10131  }
10132  }
10133 
10134  /*--- Compute the fuselage wetted area ---*/
10135 
10136  Fuselage_WettedArea = 0.0;
10137  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[0].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0 / 2.0) * dPlane * Length[0];
10138  for (iPlane = 1; iPlane < nPlane - 1; iPlane++) {
10139  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10140  Fuselage_WettedArea += dPlane * Length[iPlane];
10141  }
10142  }
10143  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane - 1].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0 / 2.0) * dPlane * Length[nPlane - 1];
10144 
10145  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
10146 
10147  Fuselage_MaxWidth = -1E6;
10148  Fuselage_MinWidth = 1E6;
10149  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = -1E6;
10150  Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = 1E6;
10151  Fuselage_MaxHeight = -1E6;
10152  Fuselage_MinHeight = 1E6;
10153  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = -1E6;
10154 
10155  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10156  if (Width[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWidth, Width[iPlane]);
10157  Fuselage_MaxWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWidth, Width[iPlane]);
10158  if (WaterLineWidth[iPlane] != 0.0)
10159  Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
10160  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
10161  if (Height[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinHeight = min(Fuselage_MinHeight, Height[iPlane]);
10162  Fuselage_MaxHeight = max(Fuselage_MaxHeight, Height[iPlane]);
10163  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = max(Fuselage_MaxCurvature, Curvature[iPlane]);
10164  }
10165  }
10166 
10167  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
10168 
10169  delete[] Xcoord_Airfoil;
10170  delete[] Ycoord_Airfoil;
10171  delete[] Zcoord_Airfoil;
10172  delete[] Variable_Airfoil;
10173 
10174  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
10175  delete[] LeadingEdge;
10176 
10177  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
10178  delete[] TrailingEdge;
10179 
10180  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_P0[iPlane];
10181  delete[] Plane_P0;
10182 
10183  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
10184  delete[] Plane_Normal;
10185 
10186  delete[] Area;
10187  delete[] Length;
10188  delete[] Width;
10189  delete[] WaterLineWidth;
10190  delete[] Height;
10191  delete[] Curvature;
10192 }
10193 
10194 void CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Nacelle(CConfig* config, bool original_surface, su2double& Nacelle_Volume,
10195  su2double& Nacelle_MinMaxThickness, su2double& Nacelle_MinChord,
10196  su2double& Nacelle_MaxChord, su2double& Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness,
10197  su2double& Nacelle_MinLERadius, su2double& Nacelle_MaxLERadius,
10198  su2double& Nacelle_MinToC, su2double& Nacelle_MaxToC,
10199  su2double& Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC, su2double& Nacelle_MaxTwist) {
10200  unsigned short iPlane, iDim, nPlane = 0;
10201  unsigned long iVertex;
10202  su2double Angle, MinAngle, MaxAngle, dAngle, *Area, *MaxThickness, *ToC, *Chord, *LERadius, *Twist;
10203  vector<su2double>*Xcoord_Airfoil, *Ycoord_Airfoil, *Zcoord_Airfoil, *Variable_Airfoil;
10204  ofstream Nacelle_File, Section_File;
10205 
10206  /*--- Make a large number of section cuts for approximating volume ---*/
10207 
10208  nPlane = config->GetnWingStations();
10209 
10210  /*--- Allocate memory for the section cutting ---*/
10211 
10212  Area = new su2double[nPlane];
10213  MaxThickness = new su2double[nPlane];
10214  Chord = new su2double[nPlane];
10215  LERadius = new su2double[nPlane];
10216  ToC = new su2double[nPlane];
10217  Twist = new su2double[nPlane];
10218 
10219  auto** LeadingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
10220  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) LeadingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10221 
10222  auto** TrailingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
10223  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) TrailingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10224 
10225  auto** Plane_P0 = new su2double*[nPlane];
10226  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) Plane_P0[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10227 
10228  auto** Plane_Normal = new su2double*[nPlane];
10229  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) Plane_Normal[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10230 
10231  MinAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(0);
10232  MaxAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(1);
10233  dAngle = fabs((MaxAngle - MinAngle) / su2double(nPlane - 1));
10234 
10235  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10236  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
10237  Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
10238  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
10239  Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
10240  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
10241  Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
10242 
10243  /*--- Apply roll to cut the nacelle ---*/
10244 
10245  Angle = MinAngle + iPlane * dAngle * PI_NUMBER / 180.0;
10246 
10247  if (Angle <= 0) Angle = 1E-6;
10248  if (Angle >= 360) Angle = 359.999999;
10249 
10250  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
10251  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = -sin(Angle);
10252  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = cos(Angle);
10253 
10254  /*--- Apply tilt angle to the plane ---*/
10255 
10256  su2double Tilt_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(3) * PI_NUMBER / 180;
10257  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt =
10258  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] * cos(Tilt_Angle) + Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] * sin(Tilt_Angle);
10259  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][1];
10260  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt =
10261  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] * cos(Tilt_Angle) - Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] * sin(Tilt_Angle);
10262 
10263  /*--- Apply toe angle to the plane ---*/
10264 
10265  su2double Toe_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(4) * PI_NUMBER / 180;
10266  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt * cos(Toe_Angle) - Plane_NormalY_Tilt * sin(Toe_Angle);
10267  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt * sin(Toe_Angle) + Plane_NormalY_Tilt * cos(Toe_Angle);
10268  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt;
10269 
10270  /*--- Update normal vector ---*/
10271 
10272  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe;
10273  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe;
10274  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe;
10275 
10276  /*--- Point in the plane ---*/
10277 
10278  Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
10279  Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
10280  Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
10281  }
10282 
10283  /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
10284 
10285  Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10286  Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10287  Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10288  Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10289 
10290  /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
10291 
10292  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10293  ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, nullptr,
10294  Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10295  Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
10296  }
10297 
10298  /*--- Compute airfoil characteristic only in the master node ---*/
10299 
10300  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
10301  /*--- Write an output file---*/
10302 
10303  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10304  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.csv", ios::out);
10305  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10306  Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius "
10307  "(1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge "
10308  "ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10309  << endl;
10310  else
10311  Nacelle_File
10312  << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius "
10313  "(1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading "
10314  "Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10315  << endl;
10316  } else {
10317  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.dat", ios::out);
10318  Nacelle_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle description\"" << endl;
10319  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10320  Nacelle_File
10321  << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord "
10322  "(in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge "
10323  "XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10324  << endl;
10325  else
10326  Nacelle_File
10327  << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord "
10328  "(m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge "
10329  "XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10330  << endl;
10331  Nacelle_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline nacelle\"" << endl;
10332  }
10333 
10334  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
10335 
10336  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10337  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
10338  LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10339  TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10340  }
10341 
10342  Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
10343  MaxThickness[iPlane] = 0.0;
10344  Chord[iPlane] = 0.0;
10345  LERadius[iPlane] = 0.0;
10346  ToC[iPlane] = 0.0;
10347  Twist[iPlane] = 0.0;
10348 
10349  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10350  Compute_Wing_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
10351  Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10352 
10353  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10354  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10355 
10356  MaxThickness[iPlane] =
10357  Compute_MaxThickness(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10358  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10359 
10360  Chord[iPlane] = Compute_Chord(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10361  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10362 
10363  Twist[iPlane] = Compute_Twist(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10364  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10365 
10366  LERadius[iPlane] = Compute_LERadius(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10367  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10368 
10369  ToC[iPlane] = MaxThickness[iPlane] / Chord[iPlane];
10370  }
10371  }
10372 
10373  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
10374 
10375  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10376  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]) / PI_NUMBER * 180 + 180;
10377 
10378  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10379  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10380  Nacelle_File << theta_deg << ", " << Area[iPlane] << ", " << MaxThickness[iPlane] << ", " << Chord[iPlane]
10381  << ", " << LERadius[iPlane] << ", " << ToC[iPlane] << ", " << Twist[iPlane] << ", "
10382  << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] << ", " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << ", " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]
10383  << ", " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10384  } else {
10385  Nacelle_File << theta_deg << " " << Area[iPlane] << " " << MaxThickness[iPlane] << " " << Chord[iPlane] << " "
10386  << LERadius[iPlane] << " " << ToC[iPlane] << " " << Twist[iPlane] << " "
10387  << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] << " " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]
10388  << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10389  }
10390  }
10391  }
10392 
10393  Nacelle_File.close();
10394 
10395  Section_File.open("nacelle_slices.dat", ios::out);
10396 
10397  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10398  if (iPlane == 0) {
10399  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle Slices\"" << endl;
10400  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10401  Section_File << R"lit(VARIABLES = "x (in)", "y (in)", "z (in)", "x<sub>2D</sub>/c", "y<sub>2D</sub>/c")lit"
10402  << endl;
10403  else
10404  Section_File << R"lit(VARIABLES = "x (m)", "y (m)", "z (m)", "x<sub>2D</sub>/c", "y<sub>2D</sub>/c")lit"
10405  << endl;
10406  }
10407 
10408  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10409  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]) / PI_NUMBER * 180 + 180;
10410  su2double Angle = theta_deg * PI_NUMBER / 180 - 0.5 * PI_NUMBER;
10411 
10412  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"<greek>q</greek> = " << theta_deg << " deg\", I= " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size()
10413  << ", F=POINT" << endl;
10414 
10415  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
10416  /*--- Move to the origin ---*/
10417 
10418  su2double XValue_ = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][0];
10419  su2double ZValue_ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][2];
10420 
10421  /*--- Rotate the airfoil and divide by the chord ---*/
10422 
10423  su2double ValCos = cos(Twist[iPlane] * PI_NUMBER / 180.0);
10424  su2double ValSin = sin(Twist[iPlane] * PI_NUMBER / 180.0);
10425 
10426  su2double XValue = (XValue_ * ValCos - ZValue_ * ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10427  su2double ZValue = (ZValue_ * ValCos + XValue_ * ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10428 
10429  su2double XCoord = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] + config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
10430  su2double YCoord =
10431  (Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * cos(Angle) - Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * sin(Angle)) +
10432  config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
10433  su2double ZCoord =
10434  (Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * cos(Angle) + Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * sin(Angle)) +
10435  config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
10436 
10437  /*--- Write the file ---*/
10438 
10439  Section_File << XCoord << " " << YCoord << " " << ZCoord << " " << XValue << " " << ZValue << endl;
10440  }
10441  }
10442  }
10443 
10444  Section_File.close();
10445 
10446  /*--- Compute the wing volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
10447 
10448  Nacelle_Volume = 0.0;
10449  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane - 2; iPlane += 2) {
10450  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10451  Nacelle_Volume += (1.0 / 3.0) * dAngle * (Area[iPlane] + 4.0 * Area[iPlane + 1] + Area[iPlane + 2]);
10452  }
10453  }
10454 
10455  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
10456 
10457  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = -1E6;
10458  Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = 1E6;
10459  Nacelle_MinChord = 1E6;
10460  Nacelle_MaxChord = -1E6;
10461  Nacelle_MinLERadius = 1E6;
10462  Nacelle_MaxLERadius = -1E6;
10463  Nacelle_MinToC = 1E6;
10464  Nacelle_MaxToC = -1E6;
10465  Nacelle_MaxTwist = -1E6;
10466 
10467  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10468  if (MaxThickness[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = min(Nacelle_MinMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10469  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = max(Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10470  if (Chord[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinChord = min(Nacelle_MinChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10471  Nacelle_MaxChord = max(Nacelle_MaxChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10472  if (LERadius[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinLERadius = min(Nacelle_MinLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10473  Nacelle_MaxLERadius = max(Nacelle_MaxLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10474  if (ToC[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinToC = min(Nacelle_MinToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10475  Nacelle_MaxToC = max(Nacelle_MaxToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10476  Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC = sqrt((Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07) * (Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07));
10477  Nacelle_MaxTwist = max(Nacelle_MaxTwist, fabs(Twist[iPlane]));
10478  }
10479  }
10480 
10481  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
10482 
10483  delete[] Xcoord_Airfoil;
10484  delete[] Ycoord_Airfoil;
10485  delete[] Zcoord_Airfoil;
10486  delete[] Variable_Airfoil;
10487 
10488  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
10489  delete[] LeadingEdge;
10490 
10491  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
10492  delete[] TrailingEdge;
10493 
10494  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_P0[iPlane];
10495  delete[] Plane_P0;
10496 
10497  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
10498  delete[] Plane_Normal;
10499 
10500  delete[] Area;
10501  delete[] MaxThickness;
10502  delete[] Chord;
10503  delete[] LERadius;
10504  delete[] ToC;
10505  delete[] Twist;
10506 }
10507 
10508 std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeViscousWallADT(const CConfig* config) const {
10509  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10510  /*--- Step 1: Create the coordinates and connectivity of the linear ---*/
10511  /*--- subelements of the local boundaries that must be taken ---*/
10512  /*--- into account in the wall distance computation. ---*/
10513  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10514 
10515  /* Initialize an array for the mesh points, which eventually contains the
10516  mapping from the local nodes to the number used in the connectivity of the
10517  local boundary faces. However, in a first pass it is an indicator whether
10518  or not a mesh point is on a local wall boundary. */
10519  vector<unsigned long> meshToSurface(nPoint, 0);
10520 
10521  /* Define the vectors for the connectivity of the local linear subelements,
10522  the element ID's, the element type and marker ID's. */
10523  vector<unsigned long> surfaceConn;
10524  vector<unsigned long> elemIDs;
10525  vector<unsigned short> VTK_TypeElem;
10526  vector<unsigned short> markerIDs;
10527 
10528  /* Loop over the boundary markers. */
10529 
10530  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); ++iMarker) {
10531  /* Check for a viscous wall. */
10532  if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) {
10533  /* Loop over the surface elements of this marker. */
10534  for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
10535  /* Set the flag of the mesh points on this surface to true. */
10536  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
10537  unsigned long iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
10538  meshToSurface[iPoint] = 1;
10539  }
10540  /* Determine the necessary data from the corresponding standard face,
10541  such as the number of linear subfaces, the number of DOFs per
10542  linear subface and the corresponding local connectivity. */
10543  const unsigned short VTK_Type = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type();
10544  const unsigned short nDOFsPerElem = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes();
10545 
10546  /* Loop over the nodes of element and store the required data. */
10547 
10548  markerIDs.push_back(iMarker);
10549  VTK_TypeElem.push_back(VTK_Type);
10550  elemIDs.push_back(iElem);
10551  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < nDOFsPerElem; iNode++)
10552  surfaceConn.push_back(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode));
10553  }
10554  }
10555  }
10556 
10557  /*--- Create the coordinates of the local points on the viscous surfaces and
10558  create the final version of the mapping from all volume points to the
10559  points on the viscous surfaces. ---*/
10560  vector<su2double> surfaceCoor;
10561  unsigned long nVertex_SolidWall = 0;
10562 
10563  for (unsigned long i = 0; i < nPoint; ++i) {
10564  if (meshToSurface[i]) {
10565  meshToSurface[i] = nVertex_SolidWall++;
10566 
10567  for (unsigned short k = 0; k < nDim; ++k) surfaceCoor.push_back(nodes->GetCoord(i, k));
10568  }
10569  }
10570 
10571  /*--- Change the surface connectivity, such that it corresponds to
10572  the entries in surfaceCoor rather than in meshPoints. ---*/
10573  for (unsigned long i = 0; i < surfaceConn.size(); ++i) surfaceConn[i] = meshToSurface[surfaceConn[i]];
10574 
10575  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10576  /*--- Step 2: Build the ADT, which is an ADT of bounding boxes of the ---*/
10577  /*--- surface elements. A nearest point search does not give ---*/
10578  /*--- accurate results, especially not for the integration ---*/
10579  /*--- points of the elements close to a wall boundary. ---*/
10580  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10581 
10582  std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> WallADT(
10583  new CADTElemClass(nDim, surfaceCoor, surfaceConn, VTK_TypeElem, markerIDs, elemIDs, true));
10584 
10585  return WallADT;
10586 }
10587 
10588 /*--- Use a thread-sanitizer dependent loop schedule to work around suspected false positives ---*/
10589 #ifndef __SANITIZE_THREAD__
10590 #define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint, 2 * omp_get_max_threads()))
10591 #else
10592 #define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR SU2_OMP_FOR_()
10593 #endif
10594 
10595 #define END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR END_SU2_OMP_FOR
10596 
10597 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetWallDistance(CADTElemClass* WallADT, const CConfig* config, unsigned short iZone) {
10598  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10599  /*--- Step 3: Loop over all interior mesh nodes and compute minimum ---*/
10600  /*--- distance to a solid wall element ---*/
10601  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10602 
10603  if (!WallADT->IsEmpty()) {
10604  /*--- Solid wall boundary nodes are present. Compute the wall
10605  distance for all nodes. ---*/
10606 
10607  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
10608  CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10609  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < GetnPoint(); ++iPoint) {
10610  unsigned short markerID;
10611  unsigned long elemID;
10612  int rankID;
10613  su2double dist;
10614 
10615  WallADT->DetermineNearestElement(nodes->GetCoord(iPoint), dist, markerID, elemID, rankID);
10616 
10617  if (dist < nodes->GetWall_Distance(iPoint)) {
10618  nodes->SetWall_Distance(iPoint, dist, rankID, iZone, markerID, elemID);
10619  }
10620  }
10621  END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10622  }
10623  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
10624  }
10625 }
10626 
10627 #undef CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10628 #undef END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
#define END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
Definition: CPhysicalGeometry.cpp:10595
CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
#define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
Definition: CPhysicalGeometry.cpp:10590
C
#define C(i, j)
Definition: blas_structure.cpp:140
B
#define B(i, j)
Definition: blas_structure.cpp:139
A
#define A(i, j)
Definition: blas_structure.cpp:138
